description:
Without Kurokan, Kirino High loses their first battle at Koshien Stadium. 
Meanwhile, Kurokan has some visitors. 
Joyo Univ. Kamobara High asks Kurokan to be their coach and provides excellent conditions.
Washinomori High students, on the other hand, is willing to offer more than they have.
What`s Kurokan`s deision?
Source: crunchyroll
